thread.title: No pay TV? How to follow all the action from Australia's tour of India
thread.title_full: No pay TV? How to follow all the action from Australia's tour of India

title: No pay TV? How to follow all the action from Australia's tour of India
text:
India v Australia: how to follow the action on Grandstand Radio and online without pay TV Updated February 17, 2017 10:47:51 Map: India 
Australia faces the daunting task of a four-Test tour of India, and ABC Grandstand will bring you all the action live from the subcontinent. 
Can Australia do the unthinkable and secure a series win against a team that looks unbeatable at home? Grandstand has the experts to guide you through it all as we find out the answer to that question. Where can I tune in? 
The series will broadcast on ABC Extra on Digital Radio, online and via the ABC Radio app (available on iTunes and Google Play ). 
If you're tuning in via a browser, bookmark this link for your future listening needs . Who's in the commentary box? 
We'll have Gerard Whateley alongside India's Prakash Wakankar for the first two Tests, before Alister Nicholson takes the hot seat alongside Prakash for the third and fourth Tests. 
Our experts alongside them will be former opening batsmen Simon Katich (Australia) and Aakash Chopra (India). 
For the third and fourth Tests, former Aussie paceman Dirk Nannes will replace Katich. What are the fixtures? What times do the days of play start? 
Good ol' time-zone conversions. On each day, expected start times will be: First session: 3:00pm-5:00pm AEDT Third session: 8:00pm-10:00pm AEDT What other coverage can I expect? 
As always, ABC News Sport Online will be live blogging the coverage should you be unable to get to the telly or you don't have pay TV (that's right, it won't be on free-to-air). 
As well as our live blogs, match reports and analysis, you the ABC cricket podcast Grandstand at Stumps will be available as a download shortly after stumps on each day. You can subscribe here to listen to all the highlights and interviews of the day's play.
